metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17263 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In libyal libfwsi before 20191006, libfwsi_extension_block_copy_from_byte_stream in libfwsi_extension_block.c has a heap-based buffer over-read because rejection of an unsupported size only considers values less than 6, even though values of 6 and 7 are also unsupported. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described in the GitHub issue.

criterions.comment: libfwsi package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
liblnk package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
